thread.title: Baseball America Rates Cajuns' Recruiting Class #20
thread.title_full: Baseball America Rates Cajuns' Recruiting Class #20

author: Jay Walker
title: Baseball America Rates Cajuns' Recruiting Class #20
text:
Different organizations rate recruiting classes with their own criteria. 
Earlier, Collegiate Baseball ranked the Louisiana Ragin’ Cajuns baseball class as 13th best. 
Now Baseball America has chimed in as well. 
The Cajuns’ class has been named 20th best by the prestigious organization and is the second highest rated class of the non power conferences. Only South Florida of the American Conference was rated higher. 
It is the first time the Cajuns’ have been in the top 25 in recruiting according to Baseball America. 
The Cajuns’ class can be seen during fall practice, which has already started. The Cajuns had their first intrasquad game yesterday and will have another one Wednesday evening at 6pm. All practices and intrasquad games are open to the public.
